message: Let's be reasonable, Alice. Time is money, and it's literally shrinking!
Come on, Bob, don't be too greedy!
Alice, my offer is getting worse with time! It's better to take a decent deal now than risk getting even less later.
Don't worry, I'll leave you with something...
Alice, let's stop wasting time. I'm proposing a 50/50 split.  Any further delays will only hurt both of us.
Getting closer, but still not there...
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking a significant hit due to inflation. My offer is more than fair, let's close this deal and move on.
You're running out of time, Bob...
